Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Kruger National Park, Shishangeni Private Lodge is in a national park and within the vicinity of Kambaku Komatipoort Golf Course and Kruger National Park Crocodile Bridge Gate. This hotel is within the region of Lionspruit Game Reserve.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 22 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces. Rooms have private furnished patios. Conveniences include phones, as well as minibars and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Shishangeni Private Lodge. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.
